function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Differences in perception of pandemic impact between developed and developing countries","Impact":"Misunderstanding of the severity of the pandemic's impact on construction industry","Mitigation":"Cross-cultural education and communication, sharing of data and experiences","Technologies":"Collaborative technologies for remote communication and knowledge sharing","People":"Industry professionals in developed and developing countries","Owner":"International organizations, industry associations"},{"Description":"Adverse effects of COVID-19 on the global economy","Impact":"Sharp negative economic growth, decline in full-time jobs, and working hours","Mitigation":"Economic stimulus packages, investment in healthcare systems, support for affected industries","Technologies":"Economic modeling and forecasting tools, remote work technologies","People":"Global and national policymakers, economists, industry leaders","Owner":"Governments, international financial organizations, industry associations"},{"Description":"Fallout in working hours due to pandemic impact","Impact":"Loss of 130 million full-time jobs in the first quarter of 2020","Mitigation":"Job retention programs, reskilling and upskilling initiatives, flexible work arrangements","Technologies":"Online training platforms, workforce management systems","People":"Workers, employers, labor unions","Owner":"Employers, governments, labor organizations"}]}
